text: @realDonaldTrump Is the silent majority hiding COVID deaths at Texas under other diseases such as dementia? The numbers don't lie! Death % Low vs other states, testing under national level, but spikes in other diseases right around the same time? #Probe #Texaswhatyouhiding #COVID19 #GregAbbott https://t.co/J4agQRJd5d
